      • getValue

        public double getValue()
        Description copied from interface: Measure
        Gets the value of a measure. The measure is incrementally accumulated for learner's prediction by each Measure.update(MultiLabelOutput, GroundTruth) call. The value returned by the method, returns sum of all update calls divided by the number of calls (average of all measures for all predictions).
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface Measure
        Overrides:
        getValue in class MeanAverageInterpolatedPrecision
        Returns:
        the average measure value computed so far
